entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who saw Ron glance at Hermione.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as the one who suggested moving on and glanced at Hermione.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as the one who was indignant about house-elves being treated unfairly.

entities.name: winky
entities.description: Winky is mentioned as an example of a happy house-elf who likes being bossed around.

entities.name: mr. crouch
entities.description: Mr. Crouch is mentioned as the one who made Hermione go up to the top of the stadium and bewitched her.

relationships.description: Harry saw Ron glance at Hermione.
